description:
A creature that can eat a Goddess` angel has escaped from heaven. In an attempt to find the creature and protect the goddesses, Lind returns to earth. She seals the temple area and thinks things are safe, but Urd falls victim to the creature, and then Peorth. Can she find the creature at stop it before she and Belldandy are next?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Ah, la venue d’un ange à une seule aile !
ああっ片翼の天使降臨っ
